*navigation **mainpage|mainpage **Doc:Manual|User Manual **{{#switch: {{#titleparts:{{PAGENAME}}|1}} |AR|BR|BG|CA|CZ|DE|DK|ES|FA|FI|FR|ID|IT|KO|NL|PL|PT|RO|RU|SR|SV|UK|ZH=Doc:{{#titleparts:{{PAGENAME}}|1}}/Manual{{!}}{{#titleparts:{{PAGENAME}}|1}}/Manual }} **Doc:Tutorials|Tutorials **Extensions:Py/Scripts|Scripts Catalog **http://www.blender.org/documentation/250PythonDoc/contents.html|Python API (2.52) **Dev:Contents|Development **Meta:Guides/Writer_Guide|Wiki Guidelines **recentchanges-url|recentchanges **Special:Categories|Categories **portal-url|portal **currentevents-url|currentevents
*extras **Special:Newimages|New files **Special:Newpages|New pages **Special:Popularpages|Popular pages <!-- **Special:Wantedpages|Wanted pages **randompage-url|randompage--> **{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|useskin=monobook}} | View as Monobook **http://pdf.letworyinteractive.com/ | PDF Manual (NEW!) **helppage|help **sitesupport-url|sitesupport

Use the form below to upload new files, to view or search previously uploaded images go to the [[Special:Imagelist|list of uploaded files]], uploads and deletions are also logged in the [[Special:Log|project log]].
You must also check the box affirming that you are not violating any copyrights by uploading the file. Press the "Upload" button to finish the upload.
To include the image in a page, use a link in the form '''<nowiki>[[{{ns:6}}:file.jpg]]</nowiki>''', '''<nowiki>[[{{ns:6}}:file.png|alt text]]</nowiki>''' or '''<nowiki>[[{{ns:-2}}:file.ogg]]</nowiki>''' for directly linking to the file.
'''Note!'''please name your files according to [[Meta/Style Guide#File Names|the naming conventions]], e.g. Manual-PartXX-self-explanatory-name, Tutorials-self-explanatory-name or Dev-self-explanatory-name etc.

To keep this wiki clean and consistent, please read and follow the [[Meta/Style_Guide|Style Guide]] when making changes. Please note that all contributions to {{SITENAME}} may be edited, altered, or removed by other contributors. If you don't want your writing to be edited mercilessly, then don't submit it here. By editing this page you are also promising us that you wrote this yourself, or copied it from a public domain or similar free resource (see $1 for details). Do not submit copyrighted work without permission!
